name: Attract
description: Marketing and outreach to generate awareness and attract potential B2B customers for IT equipment rental.

name: Qualify
description: Assess incoming leads, understand fleet requirements, and determine fit for rental services.

name: Order
description: Customer places equipment rental order specifying devices, quantities, and delivery requirements.

name: Contract
description: Formalize rental agreement including terms, pricing, SLAs, and payment schedule.

name: Fulfill
description: Select, prepare, configure, and deliver rented equipment to customer site.

name: Bill
description: Generate invoices, process payments, and manage billing cycle for active rentals.

name: Support
description: Technical support, maintenance requests, and equipment replacements during rental period.

name: Engage & Renew
description: Nurture relationships, gather feedback, upsell equipment, and manage contract renewals.
